summary: THE NEW MAGA DEAL - In The New MAGA Deal, by Dr. Peter Navarro, readers are invited to explore the future policies and bold initiatives of President Donald J. Trump as he charts a course for a second term in the White House. $NEWMAGA was inspired by the initiative of DR. PETER NAVARRO works with him being the advisor of DJT. $NEWMAGA also aims to give a boost on advertisements to the book itself.
